mapper.update:
update PHIP_ST_RS_SET_ELEMENT_INFO
FK_SET_ID = #{fkSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CODE = #{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_NAME = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PRIMARY_KEY = #{isPrimaryKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_INDEX_KEY = #{isIndexKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_NULLABLE = #{isNullable,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FK_ELEMENT_ID = #{fkElementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_DICT_ID = #{fkDictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LENGTH = #{dataLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_ACCURACY = #{dataAccuracy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEFINE = #{define,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_TYPE = #{expectType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPECT_VALUE = #{expectValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STANDARD_ID = #{standardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLUMN_SORT = #{columnSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHERS = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STANDARD_CODE = #{standardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_ALLOW_VALUE = #{dataAllowValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT PSRSEI.*, PDC.CODE DICT_CODE, PDC.NAME DICT_NAME, PSEI.CODE BASE_ELEMENT_CODE,PSEI.NAME BASE_ELEMENT_NAME FROM PHIP_ST_RS_SET_ELEMENT_INFO PSRSEI LEFT JOIN PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC ON PSRSEI.FK_DICT_ID = PDC.ID LEFT JOIN PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI ON PSEI.ID = PSRSEI.FK_ELEMENT_ID WHERE PSRSEI.FK_SET_ID = #{fkSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND UPPER (CONCAT(PSRSEI.CODE,PSRSEI.NAME)) LIKE UPPER (#{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT PSRSEI.*, PDC.CODE DICT_CODE, PDC.NAME DICT_NAME, PSEI.CODE BASE_ELEMENT_CODE,PSEI.NAME BASE_ELEMENT_NAME FROM PHIP_ST_RS_SET_ELEMENT_INFO PSRSEI INNER JOIN PHIP_ST_SET_INFO PSSI ON PSRSEI.FK_SET_ID = PSSI.ID LEFT JOIN PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC ON PSRSEI.FK_DICT_ID = PDC.ID LEFT JOIN PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI ON PSEI.ID = PSRSEI.FK_ELEMENT_ID WHERE UPPER(PSSI.CODE) = UPPER (#{setCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND UPPER (PSRSEI.FIELD_CODE) = UPPER (#{fieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
